author: Aisha Sharpe
description: Given the name, don't expect a sweet 'fruity' cocktail, instead, this is dry, spicy and complex with zesty citrus over an appley spirituous base with enlivening ginger spice.
name: Forbidden Fruit
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 7 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with ginger beer and briefly stir
